STRINGS.STRING: This test provides the capability to cutout either Bank A or Bank B for a calibratable period of time for engine troubleshooting

Initial Conditions 1. Engine Running Steps 1. Select desired cylinder bank to cutout. 2. Select Start Additional Information 1. This test will run for the 00:30:00 HH:MM:SS. 2. The Single Bank Cutout Feature has to be enabled in Features and Parameters for the Test to run. 3. If required, select Stop to end the test early. 4. If the engine is already in Single Bank Cutout, it will prohibit the test from running. 5. If engine load exceeds the calibrated load limit during the test, the test will stop. 6. Engine will return to normal operating conditions when the test stops
The Single Bank Cutout Test is not supported by the current calibration.
The test has been stopped or will not run due to excessive engine load.
The ECM has detected a condition in which it will not allow the test to run.
Single Bank Cutout is disabled. Please enable in Features and Parameters to run the test.
One engine bank is currently cutout preventing the test from starting.
The ECM has detected a condition in which it will not allow the test to run.
